name: Bird Barrage
description:
There are 2 sides to every story. Twitter wants your data for targeted ads, since you use their platform.  You want to keep your data safe.

So what do you do? You take a sword and slash those twitter bombs.

Arrow keys to move

Get the flashing lightning icon to slow down twitters wifi and the birds.

Get the small reddish yellow ball to be able to fly. use all arrow keys.

Every time you kill a bird a spike will appear. The birds will be killed if it lands on a spike. You can not have more than 2 spikes at once.

Survive until all the birds run out. There will be 40 birds.

Beware of the profile picture.
